articles.title: Argentine tattooists swamped by demand for Messi tributes
articles.description: Since Argentina's World Cup win turned Buenos Aires into a massive street party, tattoo artists have been hard at work inking the image of Lionel Messi on the bodies of fans paying tribute to the man who has come to rival the legend of the country's other soccer god, Diego Maradona.
articles.content:

articles.title: Cody Gakpo: Liverpool reach agreement to sign Netherlands international from PSV Eindhoven
articles.description: Cody Gakpos stock increased at the World Cup with three goals in five appearances before the Netherlands were knocked out by eventual winners Argentina; Man Utd had shown interest in Gakpo in the summer before pursuing a deal for Antony from Ajax
articles.content:
Liverpool have reached an agreement to sign Cody Gakpo from PSV Eindhoven, the Dutch club have announced.
